changelog.name: MiddMedia

version.fix: Added links to help documentation. Now lists allowed media types.
version.change: Upload form now reads allowed types from the MIDDMEDIA_ALLOWED_FILE_TYPES constant.
version.fix: SOAP: Fixed error in addVideo() response.
Fixed a usage of pathinfo() to be compatible with PHP < 5.2.
New uploads now display thumbnails and proper embed code.

version.releaseNotes:
This release adds support for the extraction of frames from video and the generation of thumbnail and splash images from those frames.
Every video file will have a matching image with the '.jpg' extension in each of the three subdirectories below that in which the video is located: full_frame/, thumb/, splash/. The full-frame is the same dimensions as the video file. The splash-image is the full-frame image with a 'play' icon overlayed. The thumbnail is a maximum of 200x200 pixels.
This release also fixes a few other bugs. See the change-log for details.
----
This release of MiddMedia uses Harmoni 1.9.3 and Polyphony 1.4.10.
version.fix: SOAP: Fixed WSDL to remove extra slash in soap URI.
Browsing: New uploads now get the new embed-code panel.
Invalid file-name messages are now more intuitive.
version.new: Now generates full-frame images, splash-images, and thumbnails for video.
Media browsing now can display a preview of the media embedded in the page.
SOAP: Files now also reply with embed code that can be used for the file if desired.

version.releaseNotes:
This release now supports audio embed code.
----
This release of MiddMedia uses Harmoni 1.9.1 and Polyphony 1.4.9.
version.new: Now supports audio embed code different from video embed code.

version.releaseNotes:
This release updates to the quota support and adds the display of embed code and URLs to media
----
This release of MiddMedia uses Harmoni 1.9.1 and Polyphony 1.4.9.
version.new: Browsing: Now provides a pop-up panel with embed code and URLs.
version.fix: Now displaying link to User Tools for admins.
Quotas: Quota-admin screen now updates available space to reflect new quota.
Quotas: Now doesn't truncate quotas to 2 GB due to max integer size.

version.releaseNotes:
This release includes updates to Harmoni and the MiddMedia code-bases needed to get this system running under PHP 5.1
----
This release of MiddMedia uses Harmoni 1.9.0 and Polyphony 1.4.9.
version.fix: Config: Removed custom 'libraries' config file from version-control.
Files: Now can return the appropriate RTMP url.
version.change: Config: URL configuration updated to support PathInfo URLs.

version.releaseNotes: This is the first release of the MiddMedia system to be put into testing.

changelog.about: MiddMedia is a audio/video upload and management tool that works in parallel with a Flash Media Server (FMS) to deliver user-created videos.
